TextView.android:text: Software has become significant to development in nearly all areas of human being life. The ability of programming only is no longer enough to create huge programs. There are serious troubles in the cost, timeliness, maintenance and quality of many software products. Software engineering has the purpose of solving these troubles by producing good quality, maintainable software, on time, with budget. Requirements are attributes or something, which determine before develop products. It is a situation or means that have to be met or possessed by a system or system part to assure a contract, standard, condition, or other officially imposed documents. A well-formed requirement is a declaration of system functionality that satisfies client needs.
